original: Hetusampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: hetu sampayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Hetusampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuvippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetuvippayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu vippayuttam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na hetu vippayuttaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā eka ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate tīṇi
